item.title: Collision in Coalition
item.description: Amidst criticism from the Opposition, Governor of Maharashtra BS Koshiyari clamped Presidentâ€™s rule in the State when it became clear that no party was in a position to form a government, thus putting to an end nearly three weeks of political instability.
